title: DB Cooper - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/22/22
itunes:title: DB Cooper - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/22/22
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and investigative journalist Thomas Colbert discuss his efforts to solve the DB Cooper plane hijacking robbery from 1971, the struggles of flight attendants to identify his prime suspect, and his new Netflix documentary exploring the case.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
